verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: personally] [V: ordered] [ARG1: the Department of Justice] [ARG2: to hire a former White House official who departed after he was caught up in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress] , [ARGM-ADV: according to people familiar with the matter] .

President Donald Trump personally ordered [ARG0: the Department of Justice] to [V: hire] [ARG1: a former White House official who departed after he was caught up in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress] , according to people familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump personally ordered the Department of Justice to hire [ARG0: a former White House official] [R-ARG0: who] [V: departed] [ARGM-TMP: after he was caught up in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress] , according to people familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump personally ordered the Department of Justice to hire a former White House official who departed after he [V: was] caught up in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress , according to people familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump personally ordered the Department of Justice to hire a former White House official who departed after [ARG1: he] was [V: caught] up [ARGM-LOC: in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress] , according to people familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump personally ordered the Department of Justice to hire a former White House official who departed after he was caught up in a controversy over the release of intelligence material to a member of Congress , [V: according] to people familiar with the matter .
